Name: Configuration - Encrypt App.config Section
Description: Encrypts a configuration section for the specified executable.
Author: RehanSaeed

Parameters.Name: ExecutablePath
Parameters.Label: Executable path
Parameters.HelpText:
The path to the executable that has a corresponding `[Executable].exe.config` file. 

You can get the InstallationDirectoryPath like so `#{Octopus.Action[StepName].Output.Package.InstallationDirectoryPath}`

Parameters.Name: SectionToEncrypt
Parameters.Label: Section to encrypt
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the section in the web config to encrypt e.g. `appSettings`, `connectionStrings` etc.

Parameters.Name: Provider
Parameters.Label: Provider Name
Parameters.HelpText: The provider to use for encryption
